quests.name: Monster Movie Night
objectives: Talk to Scrooge McDuck.

Ask these Villagers about a videotape for Monster Movie Night:
  ‧ Ursula.
  ‧ Mickey.
  ‧ Goofy.
Find the Videotape in a deep and dark place at the Beach.
Bring the Videotape to Sulley.

Gather the materials:
  ‧ 50 Fiber
  ‧ 20 Softwood
  ‧ 10 Glass
Craft the Big Scream TV.
Make sure you have the Big Scream TV in your Inventory.
Bring the Big Scream TV to Sulley.
Talk to Mike.
(Optional) order the 3 items you need from Scrooge McDuck

Put on your Monster Movie Night outfit:
  ‧ A blue casual top
  ‧ A pair of blue casual pants
  ‧ "Scarer Sulley" Slippers
Return to Sulley.
Place the Big Scream TV where you want in the Valley.
Enjoy Monster Movie Night.
Return to Sulley.

quests.name: Villager of the Month
objectives:
Talk to the Villagers:
  ‧ Mike.
  ‧ Ursula.
  ‧ Donald.

Help each Villager with their projects for the Villager of the Month contest:
  ‧ Ursula.
  ‧ Mike.
  ‧ Donald.
Return to Sulley.
Talk to Mike.
Go see Sulley.
Place the Villager-of-the-Month Award Stand wherever you want in the Valley.
Attend the Villager of the Month ceremony.
Return to Sulley.

quests.name: The Power of Knowledge
objectives:
Gather the materials:
  ‧ 10 Lemons
  ‧ 2 Iron Ingots
Craft the Lemon Clock at a Crafting Station.
Make sure the Lemon Clock is in your Inventory.
Bring the Lemon Clock to Sulley.
Listen to Sulley and Vanellope.
Talk to Sulley.
Go to the Monsters, Inc. Realm.
Find the Frightcade Game.
Make sure the Frightcade Game is in your Inventory.
Bring the Frightcade Game to Sulley.

Gather the materials:
  ‧ 6 Gold Ingots
  ‧ 5 Purified Night Shards
  ‧ The Frightcade Game
Craft the Dreamlight Magic Arcade Game at a Crafting Station.
Make sure the Dreamlight Magic Arcade Game is in your Inventory.
Bring the Dreamlight Magic Arcade Game to Sulley.
Place the Dreamlight Magic Arcade anywhere you like in the Valley.
Power up the Dreamlight Magic Arcade by interacting with it.
Return to Sulley.
Listen to Sulley and Vanellope.
Talk to Sulley.

quests.name: The Scavenger Hunt
objectives:
Invite the contestants Sulley selected:
  ‧ Stitch.
  ‧ Olaf.
  ‧ Vanellope.
  ‧ (Optional) Donald.
Go to Sulley's House to start the scavenger hunt.
Talk to Sulley.
Listen to Sulley giving the instructions for the scavenger hunt.
Go to “a royal hall with many doors.”
Talk to Olaf.
Find the Third Clue “near the wizard made of gold.”
Make sure you have the Third Clue in your Inventory.
Bring the Third Clue to Olaf.
Go “under the cascade” on the Sunlit Plateau.
Talk to Stitch.
Cast your hook into the underground babbling pool to find the Fifth Clue.
Make sure you have the Fifth Clue in your Inventory.
Bring the Fifth Clue to Stitch.
Find the place that completes this riddle: “Hope your veggies aren't stemmy when you visit Chez…”
Talk to Vanellope.
Simmer the Final Clue with sunshine fruit that powers a clock.
Make sure the Decoded Final Clue is in your Inventory.
Bring the Decoded Final Clue to Vanellope.
Make sure the Decoded Final Clue is in your Inventory.
Bring the Decoded Final Clue to Sulley.
Talk to Vanellope.

Gather the materials:
  ‧  25 Purple Flowers
  ‧ 15 Blueberries
  ‧ 2 Boiled Eggs
Bring the materials to Stitch.
Place the Sulley Statue in the Valley.
Attend the unveiling of the Sulley Statue.
Return to Sulley.
